meanings.sent1: She was demurring about the new proposal.
meanings.sent2: He always demurs before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The cat was demurring whether to chase the mouse or not.
meanings.sent4: The student demurred at the idea of taking a pop quiz.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds demurring the arrival of the storm.

meanings.sent4: Time seemed to demur as the deadline approached.
meanings.sent5: The traffic demurring our journey to the airport.
